Sentencas: A thermo-electrochemical-structure model has been proposed in the present work to investigate the thermal behavior and the thermal-stress of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with the bonded compliant seal (BCS) design.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design

Sentencas: A comprehensive numerical simulation model, employing the finite-volume approach, has been developed for the three-dimensional, multi-component, electrochemically, and chemically reacting flow of a single planar SOFC unit cell.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design

Sentencas: The cell temperature predicted by the finite-volume model is imported to a finite-element model to estimate the thermal-stress with the BCS design.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design

Sentencas: Effects of the cell voltage and the temperature non-uniformity on the thermal-stress of the SOFC have been investigated.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design

Sentencas: Numerical results obtained from the present study show that an assumed isothermal SOFC configuration leads to an underestimate of the thermal-stress by 28% for the cell and 37% for the metal frame in comparison with those in practical operating conditions.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design

Sentencas: Two factors are identified to be responsible for the thermal-stress.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design

Sentencas: One is the residual stress, and the other is the temperature gradient.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design

Sentencas: The dominant factor for the thermal-stress depends on the location and the cell voltage.
Titulo: Thermal-stress analyses of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell with the bonded compliant seal design
